text: "Skin Deep" is a 1984 song by English rock band The Stranglers and is the lead single from their 8th studio album Aural Sculpture. It went to number 11 in Ireland and Australia, number 15 in the United Kingdom, number 17 in Belgium, number 19 in New Zealand and number 21 in the Netherlands. ==Track listings== ===7" singles === :A. "Skin Deep" the – 3:55 :B. "Here and There" – 4:21 ===12" single=== :A. "Skin Deep" (Extended Version) – 7:12 :B1. "Here and There" – 4:21 :B2. "Vladimir and the Beast (Part III)" – 3:55 == References == Category:1984 songs Category:The Stranglers songs
title: Skin Deep (The Stranglers song)
